a: Design post-task QA gate output templates (pass/fail/partial) using brand-essentials symbols. Success shows test count and duration. Failure shows which tests failed with file:line and remediation hint. Write to references/qa-output-patterns.md.

v: Post-plan section exists with all three state templates
